sangoma::jsr309::MSControlFactory

MSControlFactory Class Reference

This class is responsible of creating new Media Session. The MSControlFactory manages the resources available on the configured D-series cards. More...

Detailed Description

This class is responsible of creating new Media Session. The MSControlFactory manages the resources available on the configured D-series cards.
Examples:

transcoding-sample.cc.

Member Function Documentation

bool Init ( const char *  config_filename,
sangoma::Logger *  new_logger = 0 
)

Initialize the Media Server Control Factory by loading the xml configuration file give in config_filename.

Parameters:
[in] config_filename 
[in] new_logger pointer to a logger object. The MSControlFactory owns the pointer and will release the memory.
Returns:
true on success, false otehrwise.
